goal: Write a blog post about {{topic}}, the target audience is {{audience}}

inputs.name: topic
inputs.description: The topic of the blog post
inputs.example: How to write a blog post

inputs.name: audience
inputs.description: The target audience of the blog post

tasks.name: Outline
tasks.spec:
- Outline the blog post
- Outline the headings of the blog post
- Outline the subheadings of the blog post

tasks.name: Research
tasks.spec:
- A blog post outline is a list of headings and subheadings
- In order to write a blog post, you need to research the headings and subheadings and take notes on them
- You can research the headings and subheadings by searching for them on the internet
- Notes are collected based on how closely they adhere to the goal of the blog post

tasks.name: Write
tasks.spec:
- Write the blog post using the outline as a guide
- Write the blog post in a way that is easy to read
- Write the blog post in a way that is easy to understand

tasks.name: Edit
tasks.spec:
- Edit the blog post to make it easy to read
- Edit the blog post to make it easy to understand
- Edit the blog post to make it easy to follow

tasks.name: Finish
tasks.spec: - Return the full blog post to the user
